Verses: 2 avar Thamadhu Vaayin Muththangalaal Ennai Muththamiduvaaraaga: Umadhu Nesam Dhraatcharasaththaip Paarkkilum Inbamaanadhu.
3 umadhu Parimalathailangal Inbamaana Vaasanaiyullavaigal; Umadhu Naamam Ootrunda Parimalathailamaayirukkiradhu; Aagaiyaal Kanniyargal Ummai Nesikkiraargal.

4 ennai Izhuththukkollum, Umakkup Pinne Odi Varuvom; Raajaa Ennaith Thamadhu Araigalil Azhaiththukkonduvandhaar; Naangal Umakkul Kalikoorndhu Magizhuvom; Dhraatcharasaththaip Paarkkilum Umadhu Nesaththai Ninaippom; Uththamargal Ummai Nesikkiraargal.
5 erusalemin Kumaaraththigale! Kedhaarin Koodaarangalaippolavum Saalomonin Thiraigalaippolavum, Naan Karuppaayirundhaalum Azhagaayirukkiren.

6 naan Karuppaayirukkiren Endru Paaraadheyungal; Veyyil Enmerpattadhu; En Thaayin Pillaigal Enmel Kobamaayirundhu Ennai Dhraatchaththottangalukkuk Kaavarkaariyaaga Vaiththaargal; En Sondha Dhraatchaththottaththaiyo Naan Kaakkavillai.

7 en Aaththuma Nesare! Umadhu Mandhaiyai Enge Meyththu, Adhai Maththiyaanaththil Enge Madakkugireer? Enakku Sollum; Umadhu Thozharin Mandhaigal Aruge Alaindhuthirigiravalaippola Naan Irukkavendiyadhenna?
8 sthreegalil Roobavadhiye! Adhai Nee Ariyaayaagil, Mandhaiyin Kaaladigalaith Thodarndhupoi, Meyppargaludaiya Koodaarangalandaiyil Un Aattukkuttigalai Meyavidu.
9 en Piriyame! Paarvonudaiya Radhangalil Poondirukkira Parigal Pavunjukku Unnai Oppidugiren.
10 aabaranaadhigal Poonda Un Kannangalum, Aarangal Poonda Un Kazhuththum Azhagaayirukkiradhu.
11 vellip Pottugalulla Pon Aabaranangalai Unakkup Pannuvom.
12 raajaa Thamadhu Pandhiyilirukkundhanaiyum Ennudaiya Naladhathailam Than Vaasanaiyai Veesum.
13 en Nesar Enakku En Sthanangalin Naduvil Thangum Vellaippola Sendu.
14 en Nesar Enakku Engedhi Oor Dhraatchaththottangalil Mulaikkum Marudhondrip Poongoththu.
15 en Piriyame! Nee Roobavadhi; Nee Roobavadhi; Un Kangal Puraakkangal.
16 neer Roobamullavar; En Nesare! Neer Inbamaanavar; Nammudaiya Manjam Pasumaiyaanadhu.
17 nammudaiya Veettin Uththirangal Kedhurumaram, Nammudaiya Machchu Dhevadhaarumaram.
